title: Weird lag that is unbearable
body: This lag has been happening for awhile. this is why I chose to quit the game before. If anyone has a fix for it pls let me know. I capped my fps at 60 because my normal fps is normally in the 200s+ and my ping seems like it is doing fine also. I have looked around and have found nothing

replies.body:
This looks just like common symptoms of *packet loss* or *extreme packet buffering*. This commonly occurs if there are certain problematic network settings locally on your network or if there are issues along your network routing to the server. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is the best place to start troubleshooting this, as it will ensure your network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps helped.
